changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.product_attribute AS SELECT ba.id, b.name AS product, a.name AS attribute, ba.key AS key, ba.numeric_value, ba.integer_value, ba.boolean_value, ba.text_value, u.name AS unit, ba.notes, up.name AS updated_by, ba.update_date FROM product_attribute ba JOIN product b ON ba.product = b.id JOIN attribute a ON ba.attribute = a.id LEFT JOIN unit u ON ba.unit = u.id JOIN agency up ON ba.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.product_attribute OWNER TO core;
